title: Google Photos can now directly delete within albums, gets new date overlay
content:
Google Photos recently rolled out a pair of tweaks on Android and iOS that make it easier to delete media in albums, and there’s a new date/location indicator when browsing.

more…

The post Google Photos can now directly delete within albums, gets new date overlay appeared first on 9to5Google.
